description: The Samastipur RTO (BR-33) is the primary transport authority for the Samastipur district in Bihar, operating under the Darbhanga administrative division. It manages critical services including vehicle registration, driving license issuance, and road tax collection for a region known as a major agricultural and railway hub in North Bihar. The office is centrally located within the District Collectorate and oversees transport operations across 20 blocks including Rosera and Dalsinghsarai.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Uttarayan, Kasipur, Samastipur, Bihar
